name: Wireless Mouse
description: An ergonomic wireless mouse with a long-lasting battery, perfect for office work and gaming. Comfortable grip and precision sensor ideal for long sessions.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: A durable mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting and tactile key switches. Great for typists and gamers who love feedback.

name: Gaming Headset
description: Surround sound gaming headset with noise cancelling mic and plush ear cushions for hours of comfortable play.

name: Type-C USB Charger
description: USB Type-C Charger Fast-charging, reversible, and compatible with most smartphones, tablets, and laptops. Delivers efficient power and high-speed data transfer in a compact design.

name: IPS Monitor
description: 24-inch full HD IPS monitor with wide viewing angles and ultra-slim bezels. Perfect for coding, media, and gaming.

name: Graphics Card
description: A GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) is a specialized processor designed to accelerate graphics rendering and perform parallel computations, making it essential for gaming, AI, and data processing tasks.
